Device¶

class Device¶

The Device class is a sub class of the port class which allows to control PoweredUP Sensors. It can be used via sensor=hub.port.A.device.

mode(mode, *data)¶

Set the mode of the sensor

Parameters

  • mode (byte) – new mode

  • *data –

    optional data to be send allong with mode, e.g., to turn on LEDs of a sensor

from hub import port

SensorA = port.A.device

SensorA.mode(1)            # Set sensor to mode 3

print("Mode sensor port A: " + str(SensorA.mode()))

from hub import port

SensorA = port.A.device

SensorA.mode(5)  # first set the correct mode before sending data
SensorA.mode(5,b''+chr(9)+chr(9)+chr(9)+chr(9))
get()¶

Get measurement of the sensor corresponding to the active mode

Returns

measurement

Return type

tuple

from hub import port

ForceSensor = port.A.device

ForceSensor.mode(4)        # Force in RAW units
force = ForceSensor.get()[0]
print("force: " + str(force))
